title: Household net worth climbs to $136.9 trillion, thanks to big stock market gains
description: The total balance sheet for households and nonprofits rose to $136.9 trillion in the first quarter, a 3.8% gain from the end of 2020
content: The total balance sheet for households and nonprofits rose to $136.9 trillion in the first quarter, a 3.8% gain from the end of 2020

title: Consumer prices jump 5% in May, fastest pace since the summer of 2008
description: The 3.8% rise in the core inflation rate, which excludes food and energy prices, was the sharpest increase in nearly three decades.
content: The 3.8% rise in the core inflation rate, which excludes food and energy prices, was the sharpest increase in nearly three decades.

title: Job openings set record of 9.3 million as labor market booms
description: Job openings in April soared to a record 9.3 million as the economy rapidly recovered from its pandemic depths, according to the JOLTS report.
content: Job openings in April soared to a record 9.3 million as the economy rapidly recovered from its pandemic depths, according to the JOLTS report.

title: Higher interest rates would be good for the country, Treasury Secretary Yellen says
description: The president's $4 trillion spending proposal would be positive for the U.S., even if it hikes up interest rates, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said.
content: The president's $4 trillion spending proposal would be positive for the U.S., even if it hikes up interest rates, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said.
